name: Magique
description:
Magique is a top down 2D shooter.  The goal is to protect the gem against waves of enemies.

collect mana from your dead enemies and use it to upgrade your firepower to keep up with the ever growing waves.

how many waves can you survive?

Controls:

W A S D keys to move around, or use arrow keys

'E' key to select

'escape' to pause 

'left mouse button' to shoot fireball   (you can hold it in)

'right mouse button' to shoot OMEGA FIREBALL once it has been unlocked(has a recharge time of 10 seconds)
